description: • Maintenance The Soil Health Card Portal (http:// • Participation in workshops & trainings Enhancing Agriculture Productivity soilhealth.dac.gov.in) project was launched by Hon’ble Minister of Agricul- MAIN FEATURES OF THE ture & Farmers Welfare on 15th July, APPLICATION 2015. The Soil Health Card Application • Single, uniform, web-based software Edited by under the Ministry of Agriculture & is a work flow based system designed and for generation of Soil Health Card in MOHAN DAS VISWAM Farmers Welfare. Under the scheme, the developed by National Informatics uniform format across the country ‘Soil Health Card’ provide government issues Soil Health Cards Centre which facilitate generation of Soil griculture produce depends (SHC) to farmers.
